entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
